title: The Berenstain bears: Christmas tree: meet big paw: play ball
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: This tape features three tales from the series written and created by Jan and Stan Berenstain. "The Berenstain Bears' Christmas tree"; Papa bear, Brother bear and Sister bear are unhappy when they cannot pick out a Christmas tree. All is not lost however when a wonderful surprise awaits them at the tree house. Directed by Mordicai Gerstein. "The Berenstain bears meet big paw"; There is a Thanksgiving legend that if a bear becomes too greedy he will incur the wrath of the 90 foot high Big Paw. Despite this warning Brother and Sister bear set out looking for food in the Sinister Bog. Directed by Mordicai Gerstein and Al Kouzel. "The Berenstain Bears play ball"; It is the start of Spring and Papa bear is training young Brother bear to be a baseball star in the Little League. Directed by Al Kouzel.
